鱕鱕鱕

鱕字的基本解释

鱕
fān
古书中记载的一种大型的凶猛海鱼，吻部呈剑状突起，其边缘具锯齿，似类今锯鲨、锯鳐一类的鱼：“鱕鱼鼻有横骨如鐇（斧刃），海船逢之必断。”

鱕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fān］
［《廣韻》甫煩切，平元，非。］
鱼名。又名鱕。一种吻部呈剑状突起其边缘具锯齿的大型凶猛海鱼，如锯鲨、锯鰩类。

鱕字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鱕； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页1478第20
【廣韻】甫煩切【集韻】方煩切，?音蕃。【玉篇】魚名。【南越志】鱕魚，鼻有橫骨如鐇，海船逢之必斷。【左思·蜀都賦】鮣龜鱕䱜。【註】鱕䱜有橫骨在鼻前，如斤斧形。東人謂斧斤之斤爲鐇，故謂之鱕䱜也。又【集韻】孚袁切，音番。又符袁切，音煩。義?同。

鱕字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鱕字的起名意思

暂无。

Yard
Basic explanation of words
Yard
fān
A large and fierce marine fish recorded in ancient books, with a sword-like protruding snout and serrated edges, similar to those of today’s saw sharks and sawfish: “The nose of the fish has transverse bones like axe (axe blade), The ship will break every time."
Yard
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fān］
["Guangyun" is annoying, flat yuan, non. ]
The name of the fish. Also known as 鱕. A large and fierce marine fish with a sword-like protruding snout and serrated edges, such as saw sharks and sawfish.
Yard
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　鱕; Kangxi Strokes: 23; Page Number: Page 1478 No. 20
[Guang Yun] Annoying and cutting [Jiyun] Fang annoying and cutting,? Yin Fan. 【Jade articles】The name of the fish. [Nan Yue Zhi] The hog fish, the nose has horizontal bones such as ding, and the ship must be broken every time it comes. [Zuo Si·Shu Du Fu] 鳣gui鱕䱜. [Note] There are transverse bones in front of the nose, like a catty-axe shape. The eastern people say that the axe’s catty is 鐇, so it is also called 鱕䱜. Also 【Jiyun】Fu Yuanqie, Yinfan. Another symbol of Yuan Qi, the sound is annoying. Righteous? Same.
Yard
